item.title: CAT: Coordinating Anatomical-Textual Prompts for Multi-Organ and Tumor Segmentation
item.description: CAT: A novel dual-prompt model coordinates anatomical and textual prompts for superior multi-organ & tumor segmentation in medical imaging, overcoming limitations of single-prompt methods.
